md:
giải nghĩa từ "corny" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Corny (adjective): quá sến sẩm, quá dễ thương, quá ngây thơ
	+ Example: The movie was so corny, but I still loved it.
	+ Related words: cheesy, sappy, sentimental, mushy

* Corny (noun): ngô (loại cây)
	+ Example: The farmer grew corny in his field.
	+ Related words: maize, cornfield, harvest

Note: The adjective "corny" has a negative connotation, implying that something is overly sentimental or clichéd. However, in some contexts, it can be used in a more playful or affectionate way to describe something that is endearingly cheesy or sentimental.

  • Corny (noun): ngô (loại cây)

    • Example: The farmer grew corny in his field.
    • Related words: maize, cornfield, harvest

Note: The adjective "corny" has a negative connotation, implying that something is overly sentimental or clichéd. However, in some contexts, it can be used in a more playful or affectionate way to describe something that is endearingly cheesy or sentimental.
